MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA26 postcode area of Girvan. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:59pm. Our team have carried out on site investigations and have located grounded overhead power lines in the Little Turnberry area. Due to the location of the fault and the extent of the damage and repairs required, our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:50pm on Saturday 31st October 2020
